languages.text: По одеянию покойника, страницам дневника и вензелям на чертежах вы понимаете, что нашли последнее пристанище легендарного капитана Бартоломеуса Орта. За свою долгую и полную приключений жизнь он избороздил весь Простор, составив карты многих звездных систем и на старости лет спроектировав труд своей жизни — армиллярную сферу, в которую вложил все свои знания. Несомненно, армиллярная сфера на вашем судне — его творение.

Judging by the dead man's clothes, the diary pages, and the monograms on the blueprints, you realise that you have found the final resting place of the legendary Captain Bartholomeus Ort. During his long and adventurous life, he travelled the entire Expanse, mapping out numerous star systems and, in his later years, realising his life's work: the armillary sphere that he imbued with the sum of his knowledge. The device on your ship is undoubtedly his creation.

Несомненно, армиллярная сфера на вашем судне — его творение.

traits.locale_text: From the dead man's clothes, diary pages, and monograms on the blueprints you realise that you have found the final resting place of the legendary Captain Bartholomeus Creed. During his long and adventurous life, he travelled the entire Expanse, mapping out numerous star systems and, in his old age, designing his life's work, the armillary sphere that he imbued with the sum of his knowledge. The device on your ship is undoubtedly his creation.

languages.text: Angesichts der Kleidung des Toten, der Tagebuchseiten und der Monogramme auf den Plänen wird dir klar, dass du die letzte Ruhestätte des legendären Captains Bartholomeus Ort gefunden hast. Während seines langen und abenteuerlichen Lebens hat er die gesamte Ausdehnung bereist und zahlreiche Sternensysteme kartografiert, ehe er in seinen späteren Jahren sein Lebenswerk realisierte: Die Armillarsphäre, die die Summe seines Wissens vereinte. Das Gerät auf deinem Schiff stammt zweifellos von ihm.
languages.original_text: Judging by the dead man's clothes, the diary pages, and the monograms on the blueprints, you realise that you have found the final resting place of the legendary Captain Bartholomeus Ort. During his long and adventurous life, he travelled the entire Expanse, mapping out numerous star systems and, in his later years, realising his life's work: the armillary sphere that he imbued with the sum of his knowledge. Das Gerät auf deinem Schiff stammt zweifellos von ihm.

languages.text: En étudiant les vêtements du mort, les pages du journal et les monogrammes sur les plans, vous vous rendez compte que vous avez trouvé la sépulture du légendaire capitaine Bartholomeus Ort. Au cours de sa longue vie, il a parcouru les Étendues en long, en large et en travers, cartographié de nombreux systèmes stellaires et, dans ses dernières années, réalisé son ultime chef-d'œuvre : la sphère armillaire, qu'il a imprégnée de l'intégralité de ses connaissances. L'appareil qui se trouve sur votre vaisseau est à n'en pas douter sa création.
languages.original_text: Judging by the dead man's clothes, the diary pages, and the monograms on the blueprints, you realise that you have found the final resting place of the legendary Captain Bartholomeus Ort. During his long and adventurous life, he travelled the entire Expanse, mapping out numerous star systems and, in his later years, realising his life's work: the armillary sphere that he imbued with the sum of his knowledge. The device on your ship is undoubtedly his creation.

Au cours de sa longue vie, il a parcouru les Étendues en long, en large et en travers, cartographié de nombreux systèmes stellaires et, dans ses dernières années, réalisé son ultime chef-d'œuvre : la sphère armillaire, qu'il a imprégnée de l'intégralité de ses connaissances. L'appareil qui se trouve sur votre vaisseau est à n'en pas douter sa création.

languages.text: A juzgar por la indumentaria del muerto, las páginas de su diario y los monogramas de los planos, te encuentras en el lugar del descanso eterno del legendario capitán Bartholomeus Ort. Durante su larga y aventurada vida, recorrió toda la Extensión trazando mapas de numerosos sistemas estelares. En sus últimos años, logró terminar su obra cumbre: una esfera armilar dotada de la suma de su conocimiento. El dispositivo que hay en tu nave es su creación, ya no cabe duda.
languages.original_text: Judging by the dead man's clothes, the diary pages, and the monograms on the blueprints, you realise that you have found the final resting place of the legendary Captain Bartholomeus Ort. During his long and adventurous life, he travelled the entire Expanse, mapping out numerous star systems and, in his later years, realising his life's work: the armillary sphere that he imbued with the sum of his knowledge. The device on your ship is undoubtedly his creation.

languages.text: 死者の服装、日記のページ、設計図のモノグラムから判断すると、どうやら伝説であるキャプテン・バルトロメウス・オルトの最終的な安息の地を見つけたようだ。冒険に満ちた長い生涯の間、彼はエクスパンス全域を旅して数多の星系をマッピングし、晩年にはライフワークである、自分の知識のすべてを詰め込んだ天球儀を完成させた。あなたの船にある装置は、間違いなく彼の作品である。
languages.original_text: Judging by the dead man's clothes, the diary pages, and the monograms on the blueprints, you realise that you have found the final resting place of the legendary Captain Bartholomeus Ort. During his long and adventurous life, he travelled the entire Expanse, mapping out numerous star systems and, in his later years, realising his life's work: the armillary sphere that he imbued with the sum of his knowledge. The device on your ship is undoubtedly his creation.

traits.locale_text: 死者の服装、日記のページ、設計図のモノグラムから判断すると、どうやら伝説であるキャプテン・バルトロメウス・オルトの最終的な安息の地を見つけたようだ。冒険に満ちた長い生涯の間、彼はエクスパンス全域を旅して数多の星系をマッピングし、晩年にはライフワークである、自分の知識のすべてを詰め込んだ天球儀を完成させた。あなたの船にある装置は、間違いなく彼の作品である。

languages.text: 从死者的衣服、日记内容，以及蓝图上的名称首字母组合来看，你意识到，这里是传奇舰长巴塞洛缪·奥特最后的安息之地。在他漫长而充满冒险的一生中，他游历了整个科罗努斯扩区，绘测出了无数星系，还在晚年完成了他这一生最伟大的作品：天体仪，将自己毕生的心血与知识注入其中。毫无疑问，你船上的装置正是他的杰作。
languages.original_text: Judging by the dead man's clothes, the diary pages, and the monograms on the blueprints, you realise that you have found the final resting place of the legendary Captain Bartholomeus Ort. During his long and adventurous life, he travelled the entire Expanse, mapping out numerous star systems and, in his later years, realising his life's work: the armillary sphere that he imbued with the sum of his knowledge. The device on your ship is undoubtedly his creation.

traits.locale_text: 从死者的衣服、日记内容，以及蓝图上的名称首字母组合来看，你意识到，这里是传奇舰长巴塞洛缪·奥特最后的安息之地。在他漫长而充满冒险的一生中，他游历了整个科罗努斯扩区，绘测出了无数星系，还在晚年完成了他这一生最伟大的作品：天体仪，将自己毕生的心血与知识注入其中。毫无疑问，你船上的装置正是他的杰作。

languages.text: Ölü adamın kıyafetleri, günlük sayfaları ve taslaklardaki simgelerden yola çıkarak efsanevi Yüzbaşı Bartholomeus Ort'un ebedî istirahatgâhını bulduğunu fark ediyorsun. Ort, maceralarla dolu uzun yaşamında tüm Enginlik'i baştan sona gezerek sayısız yıldız sisteminin haritasını çıkarmıştı. Son yıllarında ise sahip olduğu tüm irfanla doldurduğu halka kürenin hayatının en mühim çalışması olduğunu fark etmişti. Gemindeki cihazın Ort'un bir icadı olduğuna kuşku yok.
languages.original_text: Judging by the dead man's clothes, the diary pages, and the monograms on the blueprints, you realise that you have found the final resting place of the legendary Captain Bartholomeus Ort. During his long and adventurous life, he travelled the entire Expanse, mapping out numerous star systems and, in his later years, realising his life's work: the armillary sphere that he imbued with the sum of his knowledge. The device on your ship is undoubtedly his creation.
